content:
You must have separate smtp servers for each account, and set each account to send on the smtp that has the same User Name as the sending account.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1350593
creator: sfhowes

content: Thanks for the reply. I have looked at the thread: For this step...(Select account 1 in the left pane of Account Settings, then click the Outgoing Server (SMTP) drop-down so smtp1 is selected. Select account 2 in the left pane of Account Settings, then click the Outgoing Server (SMTP) drop-down so smtp2 is selected. Same for 3 and 4)...the drop down only shows Charter Communications. It doesn't show smtp1. Also this Outgoing Server option is only available when I click on the primary email account. It's not shown on the 2nd & 3rd.
creator: cgreen82
